key.name: notify-only-inbox
key.summary: Notify new messages for Inbox only.
key.description: Whether to notify new messages in Inbox folder only.

key.name: notify-dbus-enabled
key.description: Generates a D-Bus message when new mail messages arrive.

key.name: notify-status-enabled
key.description: Show new mail icon in notification area when new messages arrive.

key.name: notify-status-notification
key.summary: Popup message together with the icon.
key.description: Whether show message over the icon when new messages arrive.

key.name: notify-sound-enabled
key.summary: Enable audible notifications when new messages arrive.
key.description: Whether to make a sound of any kind when new messages arrive. If “false”, the “notify-sound-beep”, “notify-sound-file”, “notify-sound-play-file” and “notify-sound-use-theme” keys are disregarded.

key.name: notify-sound-beep
key.description: Whether to emit a beep when new messages arrive.

key.name: notify-sound-file
key.description: Sound file to be played when new messages arrive, if “notify-sound-play-file” is “true”.

key.name: notify-sound-play-file
key.summary: Whether to play a sound file.
key.description: Whether to play a sound file when new messages arrive. The name of the sound file is given by the “notify-sound-file” key.

key.name: notify-sound-use-theme
key.description: Play themed sound when new messages arrive, if not in beep mode.

key.name: notify-not-accounts
key.summary: Do not notify for these accounts
key.description: Contains UIDs of accounts for which the notifications should be avoided.
